<iPlanetDataAccessLayer>
    <ServerGroup name="default" minConnPool="1" maxConnPool="10">
        <Server name="Server1" host="userstore-0.userstore" port="1389" type="SIMPLE" />
        <User name="User1" type="proxy">
            <DirDN>
                cn=puser,ou=DSAME Users,ou=am-config
            </DirDN>
            <DirPassword>
                AQIC3NzTolg9xkfdgoJ7TcFBRc9xz8K9tn7l
            </DirPassword>
        </User>
        <User name="User2" type="admin">
            <DirDN>
                cn=dsameuser,ou=DSAME Users,ou=am-config
            </DirDN>
            <DirPassword>
                AQIC3NzTolg9xkfdgoJ7TcFBRc9xz8K9tn7l
            </DirPassword>
        </User>
        <BaseDN>
            ou=am-config
        </BaseDN>                
    </ServerGroup>

    <!--
    Datastore for storing configuration and policy data in different Directory.
    -->
    <ServerGroup name="sms" minConnPool="1" maxConnPool="10">
        <Server name="Server1" host="userstore-0.userstore" port="1389"
             type="SIMPLE" />
             <User name="User2" type="admin">
                <DirDN>uid=am-config,ou=admins,ou=am-config</DirDN>
                <DirPassword>AQIC3NzTolg9xkf/z848xMlDYsthU2AvZ1AV</DirPassword>
             </User>
             <BaseDN>ou=am-config</BaseDN>
    </ServerGroup>

</iPlanetDataAccessLayer>
